page.title: 14L'pool N'sham,Social Concern
page.content: People are generally very sad about the state of our area. Litter is everywhere and although new houses are being built there are many more falling down. People don't seem to care any more, they have lost most of their pride in their neighbourhood. They think their city needs many things. We need jobs. Once people have more money and pride in themselves then they'll have more pride in their neighbourhood. Children feel that there is nothing for them to do. Recently some clubs have started but these aren't enough. There is very little to do at the weekend. It's easy to get into trouble breaking windows and fighting. They do this because thay are bored. Older people feel their neighbourhood isn't the same as when they were young. People are not as friendly any more.
